subject: College Football Playoff National Championship
lead_paragraph: Texas Christian Coach Gary Patterson, who guided the Horned Frogs to an impressive turnaround this season, won the Paul “Bear” Bryant award, given to the college coach of the year.
snippet: Texas Christian Coach Gary Patterson, who guided the Horned Frogs to an impressive turnaround this season, won the Paul “Bear” Bryant award, given to the college coach of the year.
